title: Develop AI model for customer segmentation
description: Test the AI model developed by the Data Scientist to segment customers based on their product-propensities. The model should use customer data such as demographics, behavior, recent usage of services, and transaction history. The model should be trained on a representative sample of customers and validated on a hold-out set.

clarifications.question: What is the expected size of the representative sample?
clarifications.answer: The representative sample should have at least 10,000 customers.

clarifications.question: What is the expected accuracy of the model on the hold-out set?
clarifications.answer: The model should achieve an accuracy of at least 80% on the hold-out set.

title: Deploy AI model on Analytical-Cluster
description: Test the deployment of the AI model on the Analytical-Cluster.

title: Integrate AI model with Marketing Rule Engine
description: Test the integration of the AI model with the Marketing Rule Engine to create targeted messages.

title: Create marketing rules based on customer segmentation
description: Test the creation of marketing rules based on the customer segmentation developed by the Data Scientist. The rules should allow filtering customers based on their product-propensities and creating targeted messages via inbound and outbound channels. The rules should also comply with regulatory requirements and prevent spamming customers. The system should provide a user-friendly interface to create, edit, and delete rules.

clarifications.question: What are the regulatory requirements to be complied with?
clarifications.answer: The rules should comply with GDPR and other relevant regulations.

clarifications.question: What are the inbound and outbound channels to be used?
clarifications.answer: The inbound channels are email, SMS, and push notifications. The outbound channels are website, mobile app, and call center.
